name: Silent Hill Alchemilla
summary: Silent Hill: Alchemilla is a mod for Half-Life 2 based off of the original Silent Hill. Alchemilla attempts to re-create the iconic and beautiful atmosphere that the original game had. Focusing purely on atmosphere, the game itself is psychological horror game and tells a unique and different story from the original game with its own setting and mysteries to solve. Alchemilla also uses environment and setting designs to create the amazing atmosphere of the original game and bring back its horror and scares that everyone knows so dear.
